toothache.tip: Avoid very hot or cold drinks to reduce pain.

gum pain.tip: Gentle brushing and flossing help reduce inflammation.

bad breath.tip: Brush your tongue and drink plenty of water.

cavities.tip: Limit sugary snacks and brush twice a day.

sensitive teeth.tip: Use a soft-bristled toothbrush and desensitizing toothpaste.

plaque.tip: Brush and floss regularly to prevent plaque buildup.

tartar.tip: Regular professional cleaning helps remove tartar.

tooth discoloration.tip: Limit coffee, tea, and tobacco to prevent stains.

braces care.tip: Use orthodontic toothbrushes and avoid sticky foods.

oral ulcers.tip: Avoid spicy or acidic foods to reduce irritation.

dry mouth.tip: Drink water frequently and chew sugar-free gum.

mouth odor.tip: Rinse after meals and brush twice daily.

oral cancer awareness.tip: Regular screenings help detect problems early.

teeth grinding.tip: Wear a mouth guard and reduce stress.

wisdom teeth.tip: Maintain good hygiene and visit the dentist regularly.
